Template.HtmlPart:
Hi {{name}},

Thank you for subscribing to {{creator}}. Your subscription is set to expire on {{expiry}}.

To see upcoming exclusive content from your favorite creators, just go to Account Settings in your Niftgen account and click on Renew Subscription.

Regards,

Niftgen
